name: Ruach
description:
Inspired by the fairy tale “East of the Sun, West of the Moon” and created for Public Domain Game Jam

Created by Yifat Shaik, http://www.yifatshaik.com

Music by Mark Sparling, http://sparlingsoundworks.com/

The game and assets are is free under Creative Common-Attribution-NonCommercial licence (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/)

the Princess must navigate between the puzzle layers in order to reach the castle on the last layer. 

you can move the princess using the arrow and the space bar

mouse clicking the "directions"- the "N","S","W","E" letters, rotate the layers in different direction to help you navigate between the puzzle layers
